name: Heroes of Math
description:
Heroes of Math, a fun math game created by Thor. 7th grade Franklin Phonetic School 2019-2020. New and improved 10-15-2020 with a new timed mode and the option to try your hand at exponents!

The original publication can be found at https://simmer.io/@A_Thor/heroes-of-math ,This is just a re upload of an old game
